column12:
'desc': [u'

Mothercare It's Your Body Bath Milk - N6790 (300 ml) Price: Rs.449

Pregnancy is the period when a woman’s body goes through a sea change. These bodily changes can create a lot of mental pressures and worries. Preparing oneself for the birth of their little angel and to ensure that their body and mind is absolutely relaxed for the big event has to be a continuous process. Getting a good night’s sleep and keeping the body calm and soothed is very necessary for both the mother and the baby in her womb. The It's Your Body Bath Milk from Mothercare has been specially formulated for expecting mothers. The soothing fragrance of this Body Bath Milk will soothe your senses and give you a relaxing bath.

The hypoallergenic Mothercare It's Your Body Bath Milk has been infused with the goodness of ingredients like Sweet Almond Oil and Lavender Oil. Sweet Almond Oil is known to be a good skin moisturizer and a great skin softener. It will also help in preventing the loss of moisture from the skin. It is suitable for sensitive skin and it will keep the skin supple and healthy. Lavender oil also helps in conditioning the skin by treating skin conditions like burns
column13:
fungal infections and even acne. During pregnancy a lot of hormonal changes can bring various changes in the texture and composition of the skin. Using this organic It's Your Body Bath Milk you will be able to balance these changes to some extent.

The sweet fragrance and the soothing bubbles of the dermatologically tested It's Your Body Bath Milk from Mothercare will help in relaxing your body. A warm bath with this Body Bath Milk from Mothercare will help you in getting a peaceful sleep that will give your body proper rest. Pamper your body and skin with this sweet smelling body bath and stay happy during your pregnancy.

']

column4: 'title': [u"\n                    Mothercare It's Your Body Leg and Foot Cooling Spritz - N6791            "]
column16:
'desc': [u'

Mothercare It's Your Body Leg and Foot Cooling Spritz - N6791 (100 ml) Price: Rs.399

During pregnancy the bulky tummy can create soreness and aches in your feet. Mothercare has formulated a foot emollient It's Your Body Leg And Foot Cooling Spritz especially for expecting mothers. You can use this Mothercare Foot Lotion to relieve your aching and tired feet. The unique composition of this Mothercare It's Your Body Leg And Foot Cooling Spritz includes lemon
column17:
menthol and horse chestnut extracts.

\r\n

\r\n\tLemon is an excellent antioxidant that can protect the skin against the harmful effects of free radicals. It is also effective in freshening up the feet and even removing callus. It will soften the skin on your foot and relieve them of fatigue and inflammation. Menthol has a very unique effect on the skin as it is capable of stimulating the sensory nerves that produce the soothing and cool sensation. This aspect of menthol will help in refreshing tired and aching feet. It increases the blood circulation by dilating the blood vessels and thus alleviates soreness and muscle aches. Horse chestnut is yet another antioxidant
column18:
analgesic and astringent that will soothe your skin in your legs and provide unparalleled comfort to you.

This dermatologically tested It's Your Body Leg And Foot Cooling Spritz is hypoallergenic which makes it suitable for sensitive skin as well. This Foot Lotion that is made of organic ingredients will give you a very cooling effect that will relieve the pain and swelling that is caused due to standing or by leaving your feet hanging for a long time during your pregnancy. Pamper yourself with the It's Your Body Leg And Foot Cooling Spritz from Mothercare. Applying this at night after your bath will give you ample comfort that will help you sleep peacefully.

']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Mothercare Bump & Beyond Perfect Delivery Perineal Gel - G0658 (30 ml) Price: Rs.399

Pregnancy and the changes that come with it are a lot for a woman to adjust to. To ensure that a lady gets all the care and pampering in the world during the months of her gestation
column13:
Mothercare has come up with a wide range of products. The Mothercare Bump and Beyond Perfect Delivery Perineal Gel is a massage gel for your perineal area. This massage gel has been enriched with olive oil to enhance the elasticity of the skin and the perineal area. This will help in childbirth as the elasticity of the perineum will be improved which will in turn prevent ripping during delivery.

The Bump and Beyond Perfect Delivery Perineal Gel from Mothercare will help in softening the perineum and thus help the mother-to-be to get prepared for her big day. The moisturizing and relaxing properties of the Bump and Beyond Perineal Gel will help the expecting mom in stretching during the delivery. This dermatologically tested Perineal Gel from Mothercare is hypoallergenic as well which will ensure you that it is safe on your delicate areas. To prevent your skin from developing irritations this Perfect Delivery Perineal Gel has been formulated without fragrance. To ensure further safety this Bump and Beyond Perfect Delivery Perineal Gel from Mothercare has also been gynecologically tested. Massage with this organic Bump and Beyond Perineal Gel from Mothercare and ensure that you have a comfortable labor without tearing and ripping.

']
